entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Mine Centre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:30 a.m. EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow beginning early this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. Temperature falling to zero this morning then steady. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
